## Section-level underlay spinner

The containing component should be positioned, hide any overflow by the semi-transparent underlay, and ensure a sufficient minimum height.

```jsx
// These styles are essential and must somehow be added to the container that the underlay covers.
const containerStyles = {
  'position': 'relative',
  'overflow': 'hidden'
}

const TableRow = () => (
  <tr>
      <td>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit,</td>
      <td>sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.</td>
  </tr>
)

const LoremTable = () => (
  <div
    /* The container must somehow include these styles. */
    style={containerStyles}
    className="LoremTable-container"
  >
    <table style={{'border': '1px solid black', 'margin': '1rem'}}>
      <thead><tr><th colSpan="2">The table header</th></tr></thead>
      <tbody>
        <TableRow /><TableRow /><TableRow /><TableRow />
      </tbody>
    </table>
    <LoadingSpinner size="l" underlay />
  </div>
)

render(<LoremTable />)
```
